data.title: Town of Horicon â€“ Horicon, NY
data.text:
Public Notices & News

**Road closure**

Warren County will be closing Palisades Road CR 26 as of Sept 3rd in the vicinity of Curtis Read Road. A signed detour will be in place. Warren County expects the project to be completed this fall.

NOTE : Curtis Read Road will be open and can be accessed from the north end of CR 26.

Brant Lake Clean-Up Day Aug 31 & Sept 1

Employment Opportunities:

Highway Department is hiring for a full-time MEO. Applicants must have a CDL license and experience operating equipment. Applications are available at the Horicon Community Center or by clicking the link below.

Employment application - Highway

Lifeguards / Swim Instructors for 2025 season: Applicants must have all necessary certifications. Applications are available at the Horicon Community Center, or by clicking the link below. Please send application and proof of certification to: Becky Ross, PO Box 90, Brant Lake, NY 12815, or email to: bross@horiconny.gov. For more information call 518-494-3647.

Employment application

Planning Board and Zoning Board vacancies: There are currently openings on the Horicon Planning Board and the Zoning Board of Appeals. Interested members of the community must be primary residents of the Town of Horicon and should send letters of interest to: Town Clerk, PO Box 90, Brant Lake, NY 12815, or email to townclerk@horiconny.gov. For more information call 518-494-4245.

Short-term rental owners required to register with county - click here for more information

Mill Pond Improvement plan - revised 2-28-23

Warren County Creates New Cell Phone Emergency Notification App click here for more information

We strongly encourage all residents to install this new app that will allow us to communicate with you during emergencies or to send general public safety information. Please install it and explore its many features.
